name: normalize-css
description: A modern alternative to CSS resets
author: KunalTanwar <kunaltanwar2@gmail.com>

scripts.compile: sass scss/normalize.scss --no-source-map -s compressed css/normalize.min.css && sass scss/normalize.inter.scss --no-source-map -s compressed css/normalize.inter.min.css
scripts.prefix: postcss css/normalize.min.css -u autoprefixer --no-map -r && postcss css/normalize.min.css -u autoprefixer --no-map -r
